entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
